resources.string: Please connect and turn on the card terminal
No location found. Please ensure your GPS or location services are enabled and functioning.
We recommend enabling guided access for this app. Guided access can be enabled in the system settings. Please review the app\'s manual for questions.
Your card has expired. Please use different card.
Failed to read card. Please try again.
VAT item \"{0}\" can not be deleted as it is used by one or more products.
Save the changes you have made to this product?
"You must name the product before making further changes to it.
Choose a color for your product.
The removal of \"{0}\" cannot be undone.
Changes have not been saved. Please try again.
To delete an item, use the \'Trash\' action instead.
Are you sure you want to cancel this checkout?
%1$s does not look like a valid mobile number for %2$s.\n\nPlease edit the number you typed or insert a valid international dialling code if it is a mobile number outside of %2$s.
%1$s looks like a mobile number for outside of %2$s.\n\nPlease confirm with the customer that the number is correct before proceeding.
Printer cover is open. Close the cover and try again.
Could not print. Check the printer and try again.
Failed to download receipt info. Try again.
Could not connect to receipt printer.
Are you sure that you want to delete the shelf \'{0}\'? All products in that shelf will also be deleted.
No products in this shelf.\nClick on the pen in the title bar to add products.
Tap \'Enter new tax label\' to set up one or more sales tax percentages. A zero percent tax is automatically available. You can only delete taxes that are not linked to any products.
The version of the app you are using is outdated, please upgrade to the latest version.
Select the card reader with the S/N %s to be your default terminal for card payments. Make sure it is turned on and in range.
This operation is not supported in the SumUp SDK. Please change your payment settings in the SumUp app.
An error has occurred while accessing your account. Please try again later
An error has occurred while registering your account. Please try again later

Ich ermächtige %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, und von diesem hierzu beauftragten Dritte („die Unternehmen“) den heute fälligen, oben genannten Betrag von meinem Bankkonto durch Lastschrift einzuziehen. Ich weise mein Kreditinstitut unwiderruflich an bei Nichteinlösung der Lastschrift den Unternehmen und/oder der HIT GmbH, Eiffestraße 76, 20537 Hamburg auf Anforderung meinen Namen und meine Anschrift zur Geltendmachung der Forderung mitzuteilen. Datenschutzrechtliche Information: Meine Zahlungsdaten (Kontonummer, Bankleitzahl, Kartenverfallsdatum, Kartenfolgenummer, Datum, Uhrzeit, Zahlungsbetrag, Terminalkennung, Ort, Unternehmen und Filiale) werden zur Kartenprüfung und Zahlungsabwicklung an SumUp Ltd, Hospitality House, 16–20 South Cumberland Street, Dublin 2, Irland weitergegeben. Sollte im Rahmen der Zahlungsabwicklung die Lastschrift von meiner Bank nicht eingelöst werden (Rücklastschrift) oder sollte ich der Lastschrift widersprechen, stimme ich zu, dass diese Tatsachen in eine Sperrdatei aufgenommen werden außer wenn ich im Zusammenhang mit dem Widerruf erklärtermaßen Rechte aus dem zu Grunde liegenden Geschäft (z.B. Gewährleistungsrechte) geltend gemacht habe. Die Sperrung wird nach vollständigem Forderungsausgleich wieder aufgehoben und die gespeicherten Daten gelöscht. Dritte, die eine vertragliche Vereinbarung mit den Unternehmen zur Nutzung der Sperrdatei haben, können für Zwecke der Missbrauchsbekämpfung und zur Risikominimierung von Zahlungsausfällen ihre elektronischen Zahlungsvorgänge gegen die Sperrdatei abgleichen. Speichernde Stelle für die Zwecke der Kartenprüfung und Zahlungsabwicklung sind die HIT GmbH, Eiffestr. 76, 20537 Hamburg und die SumUp Ltd, Hospitality House, 16–20 South Cumberland Street, Dublin 2, Irland, die auch die Sperrdatei für teilnehmende Händler führen. Diese Unternehmen erteilen insoweit auch an anderen Händler, die auf die Sperrdatei zugreifen eine Empfehlung, ob eine Zahlung im Wege des Lastschrifteinzugs akzeptiert werden sollte.
Hiermit erteile ich die Ermächtigung zum Lastschrifteinzug.
Cannot send email; no configured email app found.
Could not connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again.
In order to use SumUp, at least one Payment Method must be active.
We have experienced an unexpected response from the server. Please try again.
Your device does not support Bluetooth 4.0. Please check whether a software update is available for your device.
Your phone does not currently support Bluetooth 4.0. Please check if a system update for your Android device is available. If not, please choose \'Cable\'.
Are you sure that you want to cancel setup?
Please ensure the card terminal is switched on
Please ensure the volume on your device is set to maximum.
It seems you are still having difficulties connecting to the terminal. You can try one of these additional steps:
Reset the card terminal by holding the power button for 20s. Please make sure that the terminal is turned off and not connected to a charger.
We cannot connect to the terminal via Bluetooth.\nPlease try resetting your bluetooth connection before retrying.
Alternatively, please contact our support team at %s
If you require additional help, please contact our support team at %s
Replace the batteries of the card terminal
The update has failed. Please turn the card terminal off and on again, then retry.
Please do not use your phone until the update is completed.
Bluetooth is disabled. Enable bluetooth and try again.
Selected printer does not support a cash drawer.
Sending the receipt failed. Please check your connection and try again.\n\nAlternatively, you can send a receipt for this transaction at any time from the \'Sales history\' screen.
Select a device to connect to
The card reader with the S/N %s is ready for accepting card payments. Please make sure it is turned on and in range.
In order to take a picture of your product, SumUp needs access to your camera
You successfully charged the same amount on the same card %1$i minutes ago. Are you sure you want to do the payment again?
Please confirm the pairing request on your %s AND on the card reader.
If prompted please confirm the pairing request on your %s AND on the card reader.
Press OK on the terminal to confirm bluetooth pairing
I agree to pay the amount above to the merchant mentioned.
Please enter a valid waybill of exactly 10 digits.
USB access permissions are required to proceed.
In order to provide a secure service, SumUp needs to know where transactions take place. Therefore, SumUp needs to access your location while using the app.
Check that the email address is entered correctly
Enter the email address of your SumUp account
Sorry, your account information could not be retrieved.\nTry logging in again.
A problem occurred with your account\'s configuration. Please try again or call support.
You have been logged out, most likely due to logging in to the same account on another device.
Do you want to logout of SumUp and clear your settings?
In order to communicate with the SumUp card reader correctly, the SumUp app needs to access the microphone of the audio jack.
Turn on terminal. Press 0 for 5 seconds.
Success!\nYou are now ready to accept card payments!
Could not find any new terminal during scan.
The terminal currently connected is not valid for your account. It will be disconnected. Please call SumUp support %s
Is %s turned on and in range?
Make sure terminal %s is turned on and within range
Plug in a SumUp Air reader
Don\'t worry!\nYour transactions may take up to 24 hours to be transferred to SumUp
Plug in the USB cable in the correct direction with the reader on and allow USB access.
To proceed, please install and configure a web browser application.

Plug cable into PIN+ terminal and your device.
Please make sure the batteries in the card reader are charged
Could not connect. Please try again or call SumUp Support at %s
We could not connect to the card terminal. Please try again.
Please make sure to update before %1$s.
Are you sure you want to cancel the update?
A firmware update is available for your card reader. The update will take a few minutes.\n\nWe strongly recommend that you install the update to ensure optimal performance of your device.
Make sure the device is in Bluetooth mode. Change mode by pressing the power button of the terminal for 10 seconds
Make sure the device is in Cable mode. Change mode by pressing the power button of the terminal for 10 seconds
Compare the last digits of the serial number on the terminal\'s back
Setting up card reader. This can take up to %1$s minutes.
Prices entered above will exclude the VAT rate you have selected.
Prices entered above will include the VAT rate you have selected.
You cannot delete the last shelf.
You can change the available VAT rates, and whether prices are inclusive or exclusive VAT on the \"Taxes\" screen.
You can add variants (e.g. different sizes) to this product with individual name & price.
An error occurred, please try again later.
Offer your friends a %1$s discount on the card reader and earn %2$s when they start using SumUp.

Hey, how are you doing?\nI\'m using this Card Reader from SumUp and it works really well. I can accept all major credit and debit cards with low transaction fees and without a contract. If you use my link you get a great discount on your own SumUp Card Reader.\nClick here and collect the discount now: %s
I\'m giving you a discount to purchase your card reader and start accepting card payments. To accept, sign up with this link.
I\'m giving you a discount to purchase your card reader and start accepting card payments. To accept, sign up with this link: %s
Please update your Facebook app to share this link
Cash refunds update the payment status, though not imply actual money flow through SumUp.
The refund amount of settled transactions is deducted from your due payouts.
Please verify the refund payment with your account\'s password
Please verify the refund payment with your account\'s pin
Please enable camera permissions in the system settings.
We\'re working hard to fix the issue. Please try again later.
Please charge your reader using a Micro-USB cable. The port is under the removable clip at the bottom of the reader.
Prices can be entered and displayed including or excluding\nsales tax.
How much would you like to tip?
Enable customers to add gratuity when paying for products and services.
Tip rates suggested to customers during payment can be customized. No tip and a custom tip amount will be available options while feature is enabled.
The transaction could not be processed due to network issues
The card has not been charged. You can safely try the transaction again.
Transaction is being cancelled, please wait
To cancel the transaction, please press the power button on the card terminal
The transaction can only be cancelled by pressing the red X on your terminal
Does your device have a cable input similar to the one above?
Setup within minutes. No paperwork. No extra bank account needed.
No monthly commitment. Pay just a small fee per transaction.
Secure payouts to your bank account.
Offer your customers the best service when it comes to payments and increase your revenue in no time.
Accept card payments\nwith the SumUp App
Communication with reader failed. Please try again.
The card reader was not detected. Please ensure the reader is inserted correctly, or charge the reader with a Micro-USB cable. The charging port is located under the removable clip of the reader.
Device detection failed. Please contact support on %s
Device did not respond as expected
Please ensure your device is charged and your phone volume is set to maximum.

Waiting for customer to complete payment...
